content: I was an oncology nurse for several years. I’ve learned that cancer does not happen to a patient it happens to the entire family. I not only pray for you, I pray for your loved ones too. The older I get, the more I realize that the oldest person in the world hasn’t really been around that long. We all meet our Maker. Some sooner than others, but grasping the brevity of life and the eternity of Him helps. No matter what happens, in the blink of an eye, we will all be with the One.
